name: Chernomoi
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silver weapons

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: The chernomoi's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: detect magic, invisibility, mage hand, mending, message, prestidigitation
1/day each: detect poison and disease, dimension door

action.name: Scimitar
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Shriek (Recharge 5-6)
text: The chernomoi emits a loud shriek. All creatures within 60 feet who can hear take 10 (3d6) thunder damage, or half damage with a successful DC 13 Constitution saving throw.
